about_the_game:
Hop and slash your way through multiple different factions to get back what was taken from you! Explore the internet,try on different outfits, and engage in some hyper violence as our protagonist Anarchy.

Browse the internet and read through forums,read through BunnySpace profiles and don't get gnomed!

Chat with friends and enemies alike on HiChat!

Master a high speed, high lethality combat system

Have fun playing various minigames around the world!

Get to know a large cast of unique,interesting characters all with stylized art and animations to personalize them

Retry missions freely and complete challenges to unlock new outfits and weapons!

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes exaggerated violence and gore, as well as offensive and crude language, offensive parodies of real life social issues and politics.

name: Anarchy Hops

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: Play as a violent bunny with a giant pair of scissors! (*≧ω≦*)
